short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows PaliApps secure email to be opened with Gmail and Office365 email clients

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PaliApps has created a new way to secure your emails and attachments, built to answer the needs of today’s small and medium-sized business. A cloud-based service with a simple Outlook plug-in and mobile apps it puts the power to instantly encrypt messages in the hands of every employee – and it works equally well on PCs, tablets and phones. This extension allows PaliApps Secure Email to be viewed in Gmail and Office365 email clients.
